Development Leader : Roni Ahmad
Please fell free to contact Us at
Email: roni.connect@gmail.com. MyEnviro is Neque porro quisquam est qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit Connecting the dots PT PERMATA BUNDA BERSAMA How to register new account at MyEnviro

Registering an account with MyEnviro is easy. Here are steps to follow:

1. In the Select Hospital section, make sure you choose the hospital you want to visit.

2. Fill in the Username that you want to use in the HalloBunda application.

3. Fill in Email using active email. You can use this email later to reset your password if you forget it.

3. Type the Password that you want to use in the HalloBunda application. Use a strong password so others can not guess your password.

4. Retype Password to confirm your password.

6. If you are an new patient (never been to the hospital you are currently visiting), then check on "I am an new patient" checkbox.

7. Medical Record ID is your medical record identity at the hospital you are currently visiting.

8. Date of birth is the date you were born according to your ID card.

9. ID Number is NIK according to ID card.

10. If you have never visited the hospital you are currently visiting, then after registering, don\'t forget to ask our Front Office officer for verification of your account.

11. If you have filled in all data correctly, check the \"I have read and agree to the terms and conditions\" section.

12. Click the Sign Up button

The use of temporary accounts will slow down the administration process while you are in the hospital.
We recommend that you validate your account immediately.

When you are in the hospital, immediately validate your account at the hospital\'s front office. Very disappointed Need some improvement Good Great Awesome.
